entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
